textAfterTable: Overview Features Specifications Resources The PDJ-C1080 is a Professional Disc Automated Robotics system for near-line archive, auto ingest and transmission. Enabling non-linear access to stored content with exceptional reliability and operational flexibility, Sony Professional Disc offers an optimum automated solution in today's multi-channel world. Exploiting all the benefits of the XDCAM format, the Sony PDJ-C1080, Professional Disc Automated Robotics System, integrates with today's MXF-based networked content creation environment. The PDJ-C1080 supports up to 80 Professional Discs (1.8TB) loader capacity with a configuration of up to 4 PDW-1500s in a single robotic unit. The PDJ-CS10, optional cart interface application, provides seamless connectivity with other MXF-compliant editing and playout systems. Intuitive file-based system management via user-friendly interface provides flexible applications with PDJ-C1080. Highlights: File based network operation for near-line archive, auto-ingest and transmission Removable media of XDCAM, Professional Disc System, provides end-to-end solution Automatic ingest and registration of material Up to 80 Professional Discs (1.8TB) Up to 4 PDW-1500s PDJ-CS10 Cart interface software provides seamless connectivity with other MXF-compliant editing and playout systems Quick restores from
